RecipeDef.label: butcher creature
RecipeDef.description: Butchers a creature to obtain its meat in usable form.

RecipeDef.label: make stone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts rock chunks into usable stone blocks.

RecipeDef.label: smelt metal from slag
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from slag chunks.

RecipeDef.label: smelt metal from weapon
RecipeDef.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from weapons.

RecipeDef.label: make artillery shell
RecipeDef.description: Craft an artillery shell.

RecipeDef.label: make sandstone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts sandstone chunks into usable stone blocks. Rather slow.

RecipeDef.label: make granite blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts granite chunks into usable stone blocks. Rather slow.

RecipeDef.label: make limestone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts limestone chunks into usable stone blocks. Rather slow.

RecipeDef.label: make slate blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts slate chunks into usable stone blocks. Rather slow.

RecipeDef.label: make marble blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts marble chunks into usable stone blocks. Rather slow.

RecipeDef.label: make sandstone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts sandstone chunks into usable stone blocks. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make granite blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts granite chunks into usable stone blocks. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make limestone blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts limestone chunks into usable stone blocks. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make slate blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts slate chunks into usable stone blocks. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make marble blocks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts marble chunks into usable stone blocks. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make wood planks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts 10 logs into 15 wood planks by hand. Quite slow.

RecipeDef.label: make wood planks
RecipeDef.description: Cuts 20 logs into 40 wood planks. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make wood kindling
RecipeDef.description: Cuts 10 woodlogs/planks into 15 kindling by hand. Quite slow.

RecipeDef.label: make kindling
RecipeDef.description: Cuts 20 woodlogs/planks into 40 kindling. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make steel bars
RecipeDef.description: Smelt 10 steel ore into 15 steel bars by hand. Quite slow.

RecipeDef.label: make steel bars
RecipeDef.description: Smelt 20 steel ore into 40 steel bars. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make plasteel bars
RecipeDef.description: Smelt 10 plasteel ore into 15 plasteel bars by hand. Quite slow.

RecipeDef.label: make plasteel bars
RecipeDef.description: Smelt 10 plasteel ore into 20 plasteel bars. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make aluminum bars
RecipeDef.description: Smelt 10 Bauxite into 12 aluminum bars. Needs lots of energy, so it takes a while.

RecipeDef.label: make aluminum bars
RecipeDef.description: Smelt 20 Bauxite into 30 aluminum bars. Needs lots of energy, so it takes a while.

RecipeDef.label: make sand
RecipeDef.description: Grinds 1 stone chunk into 20 sand by hand. Quite slow.

RecipeDef.label: make sand
RecipeDef.description: Grinds 1 stone chunk into 30 sand. Quite fast.

RecipeDef.label: make Glass
RecipeDef.description: Melt 10 sand into 5 glass.

RecipeDef.label: make Safety Glass
RecipeDef.description: By laying in a net of aluminum fibers you turn some glass into safety glass.

RecipeDef.label: make silicon
RecipeDef.description: Melts down sand to extract the silicon from it.

RecipeDef.label: make cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make cloth from raw cotton.

RecipeDef.label: make devilstrand cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make devilstrand cloth from raw devilstrand.

RecipeDef.label: make synthread cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make synthread cloth from raw cotton and plasteel.

RecipeDef.label: make hyperweave cloth
RecipeDef.description: Make hyperweave cloth from synthread and devilstrand cloth.

RecipeDef.label: make electronic chips
RecipeDef.description: Make electronic chips from silicon and aluminum bars.

RecipeDef.label: Make integrated circuits board
RecipeDef.description: Using some chips and Silicon, make some home-made integrated circuits boards. It can be used in any electronic device. Even if you pay the greatest attention making it, it is still fragile and unreliable.

RecipeDef.label: make ethanol fuel
RecipeDef.description: Make ethanol fuel from raw grains.

RecipeDef.label: Ground sugar
RecipeDef.description: Beat and grind those canes to get at that sugar!

RecipeDef.label: Ground Flour
RecipeDef.description: Ground wheat into flour.

RecipeDef.label: Ground Bulk Flour
RecipeDef.description: Grind grains into flour.

RecipeDef.label: Ground Bulk Cornmeal
RecipeDef.description: Ground corn into cornmeal.

RecipeDef.label: Ground Cornmeal
RecipeDef.description: Ground corn into cornmeal.

RecipeDef.label: Grind Bulk Sugar
RecipeDef.description: Beat and grind those canes to get at that sugar!

RecipeDef.label: make mulch
RecipeDef.description: Make mulch from food.

RecipeDef.label: get water from well
RecipeDef.description: Fill water from the well into a bucket to carry it around.

RecipeDef.label: extract biomatter from corpse
RecipeDef.description: Extracts biomatter from a corpse.

RecipeDef.description: Replicates slag debris from Omni-Gel.
